forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
